duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead civil site work consisting of design, permitting, and construction activities.
Develop and manage civil site proposals and oversee task management on assigned projects.
Establish client management and business development strategies.
Travel overnight to project sites domestically, as needed.
Lead assigned project teams and manage schedules, budgets, and quality of work.
Conduct field investigations and ensure safety compliance at all project sites.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
